title: DCikonZ ADW Apex Nova Go Theme
creator: Daniel Czarnomorski

extendedInfo.description: This is theme & icons pack for most popular Launchers. This is NOT Launcher. You MUST have installed one of this Launchers to use this theme: "ADW Launcher", "Nova Launcher", "Apex Launcher" or "Go launcher EX".No ads, no permissions and it's free :) The main thread of this project is the XDA forum:http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1972383You can send requests for specific programs icon on the forum or my e-mail.You can also help to develop this theme, details is on my website :)---- Please, click "MORE" and read how to apply this theme ----Elegant and toned theme & icons pack for ADW, Nova, Apex, Holo, Atom and Go launcher.Clock widget is NOT part of theme, this is "HD Widgets" available in Google Play :).Â» FEATURES Â«- 3500 HD icons and growing.- 4 Wallpapers, please download my DCwallpaperZ app for more (for Nova this is necessary)- Dock for Go Launcher.- Works with Nova, Apex, Go, Holo, Atom, SmartLauncher, Espier4 and ADW Launcher. For TSF is separately app.Â» INSTRUCTIONS Â«To apply the theme:- Nova: press MENU > Nova Settings > Look and feel > Icon Theme ...- Apex: press MENU > Theme settings ...- Go Launcher: MENU > Themes > Installed ...- ADW: press MENU > ADW Settings > Themes Preferences ...... Choose the DCikonZ Theme from the list and apply it.To change app's icon on homescreen:- Nova/Apex: Long press app icon > Edit > tap the icon > Icon Pack > Select theme and you can select any icon.- Go LauncherEX: Long press app icon > Replace > Select theme from the top left corner dropdown > Select any icon.- ADW Launcher: Double tap app icon > Edit > tap the icon > ADWTheme IconPacks > Select theme and you can select any icon.If your launcher does not support theme/icons changing - it will not work.** Please rate and comment **Tag: GSLTHEME

reviews.title: Simply a superb pack!
reviews.comment: Words are not sufficient. As a free icon pack, DCikonZ beats even some of the pay packs! And Daniel keeps making it better and better each time he comes up with a new update, beautifying my HUAWEI Honor smartphone...
reviews.author: Jo H.

reviews.title: huge icon pack
reviews.comment: and to top it all around extremely well designed. good job DC

reviews.title: EXCELLENT.
reviews.comment: Beautiful, Creative and Impressive.I look foward to more.Your icons are set apart from the rest.So many themes are the same icon wise.I love it, Thanks so much.Pam

reviews.title: Best theme pack ever!!
reviews.comment: So far this is the best theme pack I have used. Many icons available and update comes often. For those who haven\'t try, pls try it!!

reviews.title: Very Impressed!
reviews.comment: One of the best, most colorful and artistic icon packs I have.  Also gets an impressive amount of updates and additions.  Well done!  I use this in both Nova and Apex.  Would recommend without hesitation.
